function.name: create_project
function.description: Create a new SPX language project for Go+ XBuilder with the specified name and initialize default project structure

projectName.description: The project name (English characters only) where the new Go+ XBuilder SPX project will be created and initialized.

function.name: navigate_page
function.description: Navigate to a specific page or component within the Go+ XBuilder SPX project environment using the provided URL path.

location.description: The URL or component path within the Go+ XBuilder environment to navigate to (e.g., design view, preview, specific component).

function.name: add_sprite
function.description: Add a new visual sprite or component from the specified SPX library to the current Go+ XBuilder project workspace.

libraryName.description: The name of the SPX component library containing the sptite.

spriteName.description: The identifier of the specific sprite or visual component to add to the current SPX workspace.

function.name: insert_code
function.description: Insert or replace SPX language code at specific locations in project files within the Go+ XBuilder environment.

code.description: The SPX language code segment to be inserted into the Go+ XBuilder project file.

insertRange.description: The line range in the SPX file where new code will be inserted.

startLine.description: The starting line number in the SPX file where code insertion will begin.

endLine.description: The ending line number in the SPX file where code insertion will complete.

replaceRange.description: Optional range defining which existing SPX code should be replaced with the new code.

startLine.description: The starting line number in the SPX file where existing code will be replaced.

endLine.description: The ending line number in the SPX file where code replacement will end.
